translation:
Mr. Villa de Melo, August 12, 1841

Sir

Considering that you must have arrived very much on foot at that point and that it will not be possible so soon to obtain a horse for Your Excellency Your Excellency

Without further ado, send to your friend who kisses your hands. Manuel de Aleman

Answered on August 19, 1841.

Answered on August 19, 1841. Mr. Domingos Jose de Almeida Bayes Bag√©.
